title: No-Bake Nut Cookies
steps: In a heavy two-quart saucepan, combine brown sugar, milk, butter or margarine and pecans.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture bubbles across the surface.
Continue boiling and stirring for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla.
Add rice biscuits and mix thoroughly.
Using two teaspoons, drop mixture onto wax paper to form about 30 clusters.
Let stand for approximately 30 minutes, until firm.

title: Jewell Ball'S Chicken
steps: Spread chipped beef over bottom of baking dish.
Mix cream of mushroom soup and sour cream together in bowl.

title: Creamy Corn
steps: Add garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Cover and cook on low heat for about 4 hours, until heated through and creamy.

title: Chicken Funny
steps: Remove chicken from bones and cut into bite-size pieces.
Place chicken in a medium square casserole dish.
Pour gravy and soup over chicken.
Prepare stuffing according to package directions, keeping it slightly dry.
Bake at 350° for about 20 minutes, until bubbly and lightly golden.

title: Reese'S Cups Candy
steps: Mix together peanut butter, graham cracker crumbs, melted butter and powdered sugar until smooth.
Press firmly into an ungreased 13 x 9-inch pan.
Melt chocolate chips and spread evenly over top.
Cut into pieces before chocolate hardens.

title: Cheeseburger Potato Soup
steps: Wash potatoes and prick several times with fork.
Microwave with damp paper towel on high for 6 to 8 minutes, until tender.
Cut in half lengthwise and scoop out pulp.
Brown ground beef in skillet and drain.
Melt butter or margarine in large kettle over low heat.
Add flour and stir until smooth.
Gradually add milk, stirring constantly until thickened and bubbly.
Add potatoes, ground beef, salt, pepper, cheese, green onion and bacon.
Stir in sour cream if desired.
Garnish with remaining cheese, bacon and green onions.

title: Rhubarb Coffee Cake
steps: Alternately add buttermilk and flour mixture.

title: Scalloped Corn
steps: Dot top with remaining 4 tsp. butter.

title: Nolan'S Pepper Steak
steps: Combine tomato liquid from can of tomatoes with water and onions.

title: Millionaire Pie
steps: Squeeze juice from 3 lemons, removing seeds.
Cover and chill overnight before serving.

title: Double Cherry Delight
ingredients: 1 (17 oz.) can dark sweet pitted cherries
enough water to make 1 1/2 c. liquid
steps: Add ginger ale and enough water to make 1 1/2 c. liquid.
Dissolve gelatin in 2 c. boiling water.
Add measured liquid and almond extract.
Chill until firm, at least 4 hours or overnight.

title: Buckeye Candy
steps: Mix together powdered sugar, butter and peanut butter until smooth.
Roll into small balls and place on cookie sheet.
Melt chocolate chips and paraffin together in double boiler.
Dip each ball about three-quarters of the way into chocolate mixture, leaving top exposed.

title: Quick Barbecue Wings
steps: Microwave on high for 4 minutes, stirring once during cooking.

title: Taco Salad Chip Dip
steps: Mix together taco sauce, sour cream and cream cheese until smooth.
Brown ground beef, drain excess fat.
Layer with lettuce, tomato, onion and green pepper.

title: Pink Stuff Frozen Dessert
ingredients: 1 can cherry or strawberry pie filling
steps: Pour into 9 x 13-inch pan and freeze until firm.
Let stand about 15 minutes before serving.

title: Fresh Strawberry Pie
steps: Combine water, cornstarch, sugar and salt in a saucepan.
Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until thick and clear.
Remove from heat and stir in gelatin.
Cool slightly without letting it set.
Layer strawberries in a baked pie shell.

title: Easy German Chocolate Cake
steps: Pour into 9 x 13-inch pan and bake until done.

title: Broccoli Salad
steps: Trim and wash broccoli. Cut into bite-size pieces.
In separate bowl, mix mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar.

title: Strawberry Whatever
steps: Spread half of mixture in pan and freeze 30 minutes.

title: Eggless Milkless Applesauce Cake
steps: Sift together flour, soda and spices.

title: Grandma Hanrath'S Banana Bread
steps: Add eggs, one at a time.
Bake in loaf pan at 350° for 1 hour.

title: Chocolate Frango Mints
steps: Beat for 5 minutes, scraping bowl often.

title: Cuddy Farms Marinated Turkey
steps: Cut turkey breast into hand-sized pieces.
Refrigerate for at least 8 hours, up to 48 hours, before cooking.

title: Spaghetti Sauce To Can
steps: Cook peppers and onions in oil for 30 minutes.
Mix tomatoes with tomato paste, sugar, salt, basil, oregano and Italian seasoning.

title: Smothered Round Steak
steps: Add onions, celery, bell peppers, beef stock, salt, black pepper, white pepper and red pepper.
Cover and cook slowly over low heat until tender.

title: Corral Barbecued Beef Steak Strips
steps: Add sauce and onion to meat and simmer 30 minutes until tender.

title: Easy Fudge
steps: Heat milk and chocolate chips over low heat, stirring until smooth.

title: Taco-Filled Green Pepper
steps: Mix with taco seasoning, kidney beans and salsa.
Bake covered at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes.
Top with tomato, cheese and sour cream.

title: One Hour Rolls
steps: Heat milk, sugar, salt and oil until boiling.
Add yeast and mix into flour.
Roll dough, cut, let rise 1 hour, and bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

title: Summer Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in oil, vinegar, oregano and garlic salt.

title: Cherry Pizza
steps: Top with nuts and melted butter.

title: Potato And Cheese Pie
steps: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Add half-and-half, potatoes, cheese and green onions.

title: Tuna Macaroni Casserole
steps: Prepare macaroni and cheese as directed.
Stir in tuna, pimentos and onion.

title: Artichoke Dip
steps: Mix with mayonnaise and Parmesan cheese.
Bake uncovered at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.

title: Pear-Lime Salad
steps: Boil juice and dissolve gelatin in it.
Mix with cream cheese and yogurt.

title: Watermelon Rind Pickles
steps: Boil sugar, vinegar, cloves and cinnamon.

title: Chicken Stew
ingredients: 3 lb. chicken, boiled and meat removed
steps: Combine all ingredients in large pot.
Cook over medium heat until all vegetables are tender.

title: Quick Coffee Cake
steps: Add egg and beat until creamy.
Mix flour, baking powder and salt.

title: Quick Peppermint Puffs
steps: Wrap completely with crescent roll dough.

title: Chocolate Mint Bars
steps: When done, top springs back lightly when touched.

title: Beer Bread
steps: Drizzle melted butter over top if desired.

title: Chicken Divan
steps: Add onion and celery to taste.
Stir in flour and curry powder.
Add water to make 1/2 cup liquid.
Stir liquid and cream of celery soup into flour mixture.
Arrange broccoli and chicken in baking dish.

title: Mexican Cookie Rings
steps: Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.

title: Vegetable-Burger Soup
steps: Brown meat lightly in soup pot.

title: Chicken Cordon Blue
steps: Lay cheese and ham on chicken.
Roll up and secure with toothpicks.
Mix flour, salt, pepper and paprika in plastic bag.
Add chicken rolls and shake to coat.
Melt butter in frying pan and brown on all sides.
Add white wine and chicken bouillon cube.
Add whipping cream to pan and cook on medium-high for 3 minutes until smooth and creamy.

title: Corn Casserole
ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) container fat free sour cream
steps: In a large bowl, mix all ingredients together until well combined.
Stir in about 3/4 of the sour cream.

title: Poppy Seed Bread
ingredients: 1 pkg. Betty Crocker butter pecan cake mix
steps: Mix boiling water and poppy seed and set aside.
Mix cake mix, pudding, oil and eggs.

title: Buttermilk Brownie Cake
steps: In a saucepan, combine butter, cocoa and water.
Bring to a boil, stirring constantly.
In a large bowl, sift together flour, sugar, soda and salt.
Add cocoa mixture and mix well.
Pour into a greased 15 x 10 x 1-inch pan.
Immediately pour frosting over brownies and spread evenly.

title: Taco Salad
steps: Combine all ingredients except lettuce and corn chips in crock-pot and mix well.
Heat Velveeta cheese and Ro-Tel tomatoes in saucepan until melted, stirring constantly.
Layer lettuce, beef mixture, tomatoes, cheese sauce and corn chips on individual plates.

title: Pizza Dippers
ingredients: 10 oz. can Pillsbury refrigerator pizza crust
steps: Unroll pizza crust, cut in half crosswise and then into 8 (1-inch) strips (16 total).
Place strips apart on cookie sheet.
Serve immediately with pizza sauce for dipping.

title: Madge'S Refrigerator Rolls
steps: Sprinkle sugar over yeast in water and let foam.
Mix milk, sugar, shortening or oleo and salt in saucepan and scald.
Add flour and stir until dough is soft.
Cover and let rise until doubled.
Bake in muffin tins using two small balls dipped in melted oleo to form one roll.

title: Super Sundae Pie
steps: Set slice of pie on top.
Garnish with syrup, nuts, whipped cream and cherries.

title: Cranberry-Orange Relish For Poultry
ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) can pear halves, drained and chopped
steps: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan.
Bring to a boil over medium heat.
Reduce heat and simmer until thick.

title: Swedish Heirloom Cookies
steps: Cream shortening and butter until light and fluffy.
Add powdered sugar and salt; mix well.
Add water, vanilla and ground almonds.
Place on ungreased baking sheets and flatten slightly.
Dredge warm cookies in powdered sugar.

title: Garden Cabbage Salad
steps: Toss with Dressing just before serving.

title: London Broil
steps: Cover and refrigerate 3 hours or overnight, turning several times.
Broil 3 inches from heat about 5 minutes.
Carve very thin slices diagonally across the grain.

title: Hello Dolly Bars
steps: Spread in bottom of greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer Chocolate Chips, Butterscotch Chips, walnuts and coconut.

title: Macaroni And Cheese Casserole
ingredients: 1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
steps: Before baking, cover with crumbled cheese crackers and dot with butter.

title: Betsy's Chocolate Fudge Cake
steps: Melt chocolate over hot water and cool.
Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.
Add sugar and eggs and beat at high speed until light and fluffy (about 5 minutes).
Stir in dry ingredients alternating with sour cream.
Pour into pans and bake at 350° for 35 minutes.
Cool 10 minutes in pans then turn out and cool completely before icing with Chocolate Fudge Frosting.

title: Cream Cheese Squares
steps: Mix cake mix, egg and margarine.
Press into 9 x 12-inch sheet cake pan.
Mix and cream together sugar, eggs and cream cheese.

title: Beef Barbecue
steps: Cook on low to medium heat 3 to 4 hours (on top of stove).
Add extra water and ketchup if liquid disappears.

title: Chicken Stroganoff
steps: In skillet, heat 1 Tbsp. oil over medium heat.
Add chicken and garlic and cook as for stir-fry.
Bring to a boil and boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.

title: Cream Pie And Pudding(Microwave)
steps: Combine sugar, flour and salt in a deep 2-quart glass bowl.
Add eggs or yolks and milk.
Beat with a whisk until smooth.
Microwave at full power for 8 minutes, stirring 3 times.

title: Crispix Cookies
steps: Melt butterscotch and semi-sweet chocolate morsels in large saucepan over low heat, stirring constantly until smooth.
Remove from heat and add peanuts and Crispix cereal.
Drop by teaspoons onto waxed paper and chill until firm.

title: Rum Balls
steps: Combine wafers, nuts and 1/2 c. powdered sugar in large bowl.
Melt chocolate and corn syrup together.
Add rum and stir until smooth.
Pour over crumb mixture and mix thoroughly.
Roll each ball in remaining 1 c. powdered sugar.
Store airtight for at least 3 days before serving.

title: Millionaire Cake
ingredients: 20 oz. can crushed pineapple and juice
steps: Bake in 9 x 13-inch pan at 350° for 45 to 55 minutes.

title: Hawaiian Carrots
steps: Scrape and cut carrots into small pieces.
Cook pineapple juice, cornstarch, oleo and brown sugar until thick.
Better if made a day ahead.

title: Ginny'S Salad
steps: Wash, dry and break lettuce into bite-size pieces.
Mix with dressing just before serving.

title: Onion Soup
steps: Cook onions in butter and oil for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add sugar and cook 15 minutes until onions are brown.
Add broth and wine and seasonings.
Toast bread in 350° oven for 20 minutes.
Baste each slice with 1/2 teaspoon of oil and garlic.
Serve soup with toast floating on top.

title: Banana Walnut Cake
steps: Add baking powder, soda and salt.
Add milk alternately with flour mixture.

title: Fish And Broccoli Roll-Ups
steps: Alternate broccoli pieces and rolled fish strips onto kabob spears.
Add lemon wedges to each end.

title: Fat Free Pizza Treats
steps: Toast in toaster oven until cheese melts.

title: Sesame Chicken Wings
ingredients: 2 lb. chicken wings, wing tips cut off
steps: Whisk together soy sauce, garlic, ginger, honey and black pepper to taste.
Add chicken wings and toss to coat.
Marinate covered and chilled for 2 hours.
Line a pan with foil and arrange wings in one layer, reserving marinade.
Brush with sesame oil and sprinkle with sesame seed.
Bake at 400° for 30 to 35 minutes, basting occasionally with reserved marinade until browned.

title: Imitation Crabmeat Salad
steps: Shred crabmeat into thin strips about 1/4 to 1/2-inch x 3 to 4-inches long.
Add sour cream, mayonnaise, celery, green onions, water chestnuts, pea pods, dill weed, onion powder, Beau Monde, celery salt and pepper.
Chill at least 1/2 hour before serving.

title: Macaroni And Cottage Cheese
steps: Cook macaroni until tender and drain.
Add salt and pepper to taste.

title: String Pie
steps: Brown meat and onions in large skillet, stirring to separate meat.
In large bowl, combine Parmesan cheese, eggs and butter.
Spread in bottom of 13 x 9-inch pan.
Pour sauce mixture over cottage cheese.
Bake at 350° until cheese melts, about 20 minutes.

title: Easters Hamburgers
steps: Mix tomato sauce with mustard, brown sugar, salt and pepper and chili powder.

title: Coconut Macaroons
steps: Combine coconut, flour, sugar and salt.
Stir in egg whites and almond extract.
Drop batter by teaspoonfuls about 1 inch apart.

title: Cranberry Salad
steps: Dissolve Jell-O and sugar in water.

title: Lazy Day Salad
ingredients: 1 large can crushed pineapple with juice
steps: Keeps 7 to 10 days in the fridge.

title: Pear Relish
steps: Let pears, onions, green peppers, sweet red peppers and hot peppers stand in separate containers for 1 hour.
Pour boiling water over each and drain well.
Combine all ingredients in a large kettle.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer uncovered 30 minutes.
Ladle into hot sterilized jars leaving 1/4 inch headspace.
Remove air bubbles and wipe rims.
Process in a boiling water bath 20 minutes.
Store in a cool place 1 month before using.

title: Strawberry Bread
ingredients: 2 1/2 c. fresh crushed strawberries or 2 (10 oz.) containers frozen strawberries (thawed)
steps: Grease and flour two 9 x 5-inch loaf pans.
In a medium bowl, stir together strawberries and eggs.
In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cinnamon, soda, salt and nuts.
Add berry mixture to dry ingredients and stir until blended.
Pour into pans and bake 1 hour or until a toothpick comes out clean.

title: Strawberry Salad
steps: Add pineapple, bananas, pecans and sour cream.
Pour half of the mixture into a pan and let set.

title: Chili Beef Casserole
steps: Cook macaroni in boiling salted water until done (10 to 12 minutes). Drain thoroughly.
Add tomato soup and chili beef soup.
Heat 5 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally until bubbly.
Cut cheese into 3 slices and place on top.

title: Bread
ingredients: 3 1/2 to 4 c. bread flour (total flour about 5 c.)
steps: Add butter, sugar, salt and whole wheat flour.
Fold in last flour by hand.
Place in oiled bowl and oil top.
Cover with wax paper and let rise until doubled.
Divide into pans and let rise again.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes to 1 hour until golden brown.

title: Salmon Casserole
steps: Mix liquid with lemon juice, salt, pepper and sour cream.
Cover and bake at 350° for 30 minutes (yields 4 servings).

title: Carrie'S Cabbage Soup
steps: Combine all ingredients in a large pot.
Add 1 lb. ground beef (browned, optional) or 1 lb. sausage in the last 20 minutes.

title: Chicken And Pasta Salad
ingredients: 3 cooked chicken breasts, cut into small pieces
steps: Combine noodles, chicken, grapes and almonds.
Mix mayonnaise, Ranch dressing, creamy Italian dressing and sugar to taste.

title: Calico Beans
steps: Bake in casserole dish at 350° for 45 minutes.

title: Penne Al'Arrabbiato
ingredients: whole tiny red peppers to taste
steps: Sauté garlic in olive oil briefly.
Add tomatoes, parsley, red peppers and salt.
Simmer in open skillet until pasta is cooked.

title: Spinach Dip
steps: Mix with cream cheese and remaining ingredients.
Pour Sangaree Punch over ice mold.
Add cognac, Triple Sec, vodka and Meyers dark rum.

title: Easy Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: 2 c. cooked chicken, cut into bite-size pieces
steps: Lightly spray a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Mix vegetables, soups and spread over chicken.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes until golden brown.

title: Fruit Pizza
steps: Spread cookie dough on baking sheet.
Bake 12 to 13 minutes at temperature listed on package.

title: Grasshopper Pie
steps: Fill with creme de menthe, Marshmallow Fluff and whipped cream.

title: Squash Souffle
ingredients: 2 Tbsp. butter or Land O Lakes sweet cream spread
1 c. reduced fat Cheddar cheese, grated
steps: Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes until firm.

title: Apple Kuchen
steps: Press in apples, rounded side up.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes until golden.

title: Eggplant-Tomato Casserole
steps: Peel and slice eggplant into 1/4-inch rounds.
Sprinkle with some of the grated Parmesan cheese.
Cover and bake at 400° for 30 to 40 minutes until eggplant is tender.

title: Strawberry Bread
steps: Stir wet ingredients into dry just until moistened.

title: Salsa
ingredients: garlic, fresh or powdered to taste

title: Cauliflower-Broccoli Casserole
steps: Simmer cauliflower and broccoli until tender.
Add cream of mushroom soup, milk and Velveeta cheese.
Combine vegetables with cheese mixture and rice.

title: Cabbage Casserole
steps: Sauté celery, bell pepper and onion in margarine.
Remove from heat and stir in soup and pimento.

title: Best Ever Salad
ingredients: 8 oz. fine spaghetti or 7 oz. Mexican angel hair
steps: Add onion, green pepper, celery, tomatoes, salt and pepper, and curry.
Stir in cream of celery soup and mayonnaise if needed.

title: Black Bottom Cupcakes
steps: Mix cream cheese, egg, sugar and salt.
Mix flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt.
Add water, oil, vinegar and vanilla.
Fill cupcake liners 1/3 full with chocolate batter.

title: Tuna Casserole
ingredients: 1 large box Kraft macaroni and cheese dinner
steps: Prepare macaroni and cheese according to directions on box.
Cook and drain peas if frozen.
Sauté celery and onion and drain.
Combine with tuna, cream of mushroom soup, peas, water, salt and pepper.

title: Oatmeal Pie(Cheap Pecan Pie)
steps: Add oatmeal, syrup, sugar, coconut and vanilla.

title: Chili Con Carne
steps: Brown hamburger with garlic and onion.
Stir in chili powder, salt and pepper.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring often.
Add hot water if too thick.

title: Swiss Chicken Casserole
ingredients: 2 c. Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing mix
steps: Arrange chicken in lightly greased 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish.
Top each chicken breast with a slice of Swiss cheese.
Mix cream chicken soup and milk.
Cover and bake at 350° for 50 minutes.

title: Happy Face Cookies
steps: Blend in flour, baking powder, salt, vanilla and powdered milk.

title: No Bake Cookies
steps: Melt almond bark according to package directions.
Stir in marshmallows, peanuts, Rice Krispies and Cap'n Crunch.
Drop on waxed paper and shape.

title: Slinky(Apple Flavored, Low Calorie Quencher)
steps: Pour water and juice into glass.
Garnish with apple slices and sprig of mint.

title: Green Bean Specialty
steps: Mix bacon grease, brown sugar, vinegar and military.
Top with 4 pieces cooked and crumbled bacon.

title: Raspberry Nut Perfection
ingredients: 1 (1 lb. 6 oz.) can red raspberry pie filling
steps: Spread pie filling in 8-inch square pan.
Mix cake mix, water and egg.

title: Mexican Chicken
steps: Layer with onion, cheese, Doritos, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup and Ro-Tel.

title: 10 Minute Peanut Brittle
steps: In a 2-quart casserole, mix sugar, corn syrup and salt.
Microwave 2 to 6 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes until lightly browned.
Stir in butter, vanilla and soda until foamy.
Spread on a well-buttered cookie sheet.

title: Onion Dressing
steps: Shake together in a covered jar.

title: Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
steps: Stir in peanut butter until smooth.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper.

title: Pastry Crunch
steps: Melt candy coating in microwave according to directions on package.
Spread on wax paper to cool.
Break into pieces and store in airtight container.

title: Chippewa Soup
steps: Add garlic and cook a few minutes more.
Add tomato puree, water, ham, potatoes, herbs, and peas.
Reduce heat and simmer about 3 hours.
Note: This is a base that should be slightly salty.

title: Voodoo Chicken
steps: Mix vinegar, soy sauce, onion, garlic and pepper.
Remove chicken and coat with mustard and ketchup.
Bake skin side down at 350° for 30 minutes.
Turn chicken and mix remaining mustard and ketchup with milk and remaining marinade.
Pour over chicken and bake another 45 minutes (total baking time 1 hour 15 minutes).

title: Chicken Divan
steps: Boil and debone chicken, cut into bite-size pieces.
Mix soup, curry powder and lemon juice.
Mix bread crumbs and melted margarine.

title: Old Fashioned Tea Cakes
steps: Add eggs, one at a time.
Mix in milk, nutmeg and vanilla.
Sift together flour and baking powder.
Add enough flour to roll and cut.
Bake on ungreased cookie sheets at 325° for 15 minutes (yields about 4 dozen).

title: French Toast And Sauce
steps: Beat eggs, milk, lemonade and salt together.
Melt 1 Tbsp. butter in skillet for each slice of bread.
Dip bread in egg mixture and cook until browned on both sides.

title: Spaghetti Pie
steps: Cook spaghetti in boiling water until tender.
Press into 10-inch pie plate sprayed with Pam.
Spread cottage cheese or Ricotta over bottom.
Brown beef with onion and green pepper.

title: Chicken Casserole
steps: Mix all ingredients in buttered casserole dish.
Bake at 350° until bubbly, at least 1 hour.

title: Favorite Chocolate Cake
steps: Add sugar, eggs, food coloring and shortening.
Pour into greased and floured pans.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes (tube pan about 40 minutes).

title: Devil'S Chicken(Pollo Alla Diavola)
steps: Cut open chicken by removing backbone and flattening.
Mix olive oil, hot pepper sauce, lemon juice, pepper and salt.

title: Friendship Tea
steps: Use 3 heaping tablespoonfuls per cup of hot water.

title: Heath Bar Pie
steps: Pour into graham cracker pie crust.
Top with chocolate curls or chopped nuts.

title: Victorian Baked French Toast
steps: Cook brown sugar, butter and corn syrup until melted.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes until lightly browned.

title: Quick Swedish Meatballs
steps: Mix all ingredients except milk and stroganoff sauce mix.
Blend remaining milk with stroganoff sauce mix.

title: Irish Stew(Microwave)
steps: Combine all ingredients in a 4-quart casserole.
Cook on power level 3 for 35 to 40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add carrots and cook 15 minutes more.

title: Peach Salad
steps: Dissolve Jello in 2/3 c. hot water with 1/2 c. sugar.
Mix in milk and cream cheese.

title: Hidden Valley Ranch Oyster Crackers
ingredients: 1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch salad dressing mix
steps: Add lemon pepper, dill weed and garlic powder.
Pour over crackers and stir to coat.
Warm in very low oven for 15 to 20 minutes.
